post.body: Thanks for the mention about my site.

RETWEET a25hourday New Post: Productivity Blogs - Great Reading http://tinyurl.com/6zjhk7 Thks 4 mention
I wish you all the energy you need to do 3 days of MAJOR speaking - I know that can take a lot out of you.
Definately a holiday classic! We love it.
I can completely relate!
That is what makes you a great consultant - empathy and compassion and a non-judgmental attitude!
I know that my puppy gets jealous of my son all of the time! If one is on my lap the other one wants to be too.
Yes. I think it is an awesome tool.
My puppy is excellent at that too. "what? I wasn't doing anything...really!"
Answer: January is National GET ORGANIZED Month!
You forgot to mention 8-track cassettes.
I'm not too fond of the white stuff either!
No kidding! Way toooo cute!
I'm excited to see how your most recent contest works out. Great companies represented.
As long as you can find what you need, then I agree with you!
thanks for the follow. I look forward to connecting.
Thanks - I'm not very good at being ill. I'd much rather be the caregiver!
I agree! Clutter is postponed decisions.
I have a similar experience.
thanks for the follow - I wish you great success with your new green body products line. Sounds great
love your brief bio -- transparency on my part: I hate to clean too! Thanks for the follow

thanks for the follow. You share some great quotes! Look forward to talking.

Started business in 2002. Left corp am. in 2003.
So true, so true!
Nope! You'll never sound like a whimp to me! I wouldn't be doing the running. I admire you for making that goal and reachi ...
enjoy!
I so agree!
be warm!
thank you
safe journey!
You are a better woman than me!! You know, you could be running in 40 below in Chicago -- it is COLD over here! :-)
make sure to get the soft kind!
Yes v. pretty until U slip & fall - a # of times ... boy will I be bruised tom! :-D
is it snow or ice? We are slipping and sliding all over around here! Solid sheets of slick glass like stuff everywhere.
Of course, we did not encourage a repeat performance of that!
Yup! That sounds like my son when he was that age. By 3.5 he had eaten an entire pizza himself & did not get sick!
my mascara runs every time with that song too!
Look forward to it!
You are most welcome my dear!

Email clogged? Try reading it backwards (date)! Many have found that helps them actually get through more & faster.
A big warm welcome all my new followers @eleesha, @pixily_CEO, @peterfrancis, @caregiving look 4ward 2 reading all YR tweets ~enjoy the day!
Still fighting the flu.
I hope your day had laughter too! Good night all.
"girls are gross and that was SICK" he declared. Ahh. So then my dad asks him if she was cute.... and the pandemonium began.
Funniest thing today: Son said it was the "worst bus ride ever" - when asked why-he showed me a paper a girl gave him that said "I love you"
RT Marcia needs a hand here. Can ya'll help? @marciahoeck: Did you leave a corporate job to start a business or work for yourself? Why?
RT @SmBizGuru: I just moved to Montana - Can you help me connect with more people from Montana? Please RT
RT To all sharing quotes - THANKS! Thought you might like to know there is a group on LinkedIN just for sharing quotes too.
My BROTHER IS HERE!! Have not seen him in a year. Good night tweeps! Gonna spend time w/ fam.
Totally excited about my new business experts series to launch REALLY SOON! W00t! :-D
Listening to Josh Groban singing Christmas music and getting tingles up and down my back.
